message: All of our robots got hijacked, they're going on rampage in our Zon city.
name: Dr. Mercury

message: Since you use different command protocol, you're not hijacked. We only have you left.
name: Dr. Mercury

message: We need you to go into Zon city and take care of them ASAP.
name: Dr. Mercury

message: Don't worry about equipment and feature, I'll keep installing more module.
name: Dr. Mercury
